symptoms such as breathlessness, feeling tired or too weak to get out of bed.11  If the moth-
er’s bleeding is not controlled or her pulse is high, then the mother should be treated and 
the mother’s discharge should be delayed. Under no circumstances should a mother with 
uncontrolled bleeding be discharged.
